document_data.name: One-Arm McGinty
document_data.mainbody: '''"One-Arm" McGinty''' was a former [[thief]], and the proprietor of [[The Red Dragon Tavern]] in [[Freedale]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: One-Arm McGinty was a sneaky sort who listened in on things habitually.
document_data.Activities: Before losing his arm, he was a thief who visited a number of dungeons. Afterwards, he became a tavernkeeper.
document_data.Relationships: He was friends with [[Slinker]], and often chatted about the latest news with him.
document_data.History: One-Arm McGinty lost an arm while delving in a dungeon, and opened the tavern after that.
